thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 2 of 3
thread.title: Bruce

author: Bruce
title: Bruce
text:
I like going to out of the way places, unique spots around the world, as well as cover all the normal popular sights.
Intrepid tend to steer clear of 'touristy areas' and give experiences in unique locations using local transport, guides, food, and accommodation. I take part in all of the recommended activities and have never been disappointed.
Intrepid gives you the security of a Leader and small group, but also the ability to do what you want yourself as well.
